title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Michael Malice | 2/4/22
description:
Bill O’Reilly joins to recap the week's biggest news, including President Biden’s statement on police, the collapse of CNN, and Whoopi Goldberg’s controversial Holocaust statements. Author Michael Malice joins Glenn to discuss various issues, including Biden’s forthcoming Supreme Court pick, Boris Johnson, and the upcoming Chinese Olympics. Glenn and Stu discuss the Chinese Olympics and the propaganda pushed immediately in the opening ceremony. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
